vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.21.18;
son of: Rapha (H7497A);
brother of: Goliath (H1555), Ishbi-benob (H3430) , Lahmi (H3902), huge_man (H4060A); also called Sippai at 1Ch.20.4;
Another name of saph (סַף "Saph" H5593)
§ Sippai = "threshold"
one of the sons of the Philistine giant slain by Sibbechai the Hushathite
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細派 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "篩選"
被戶沙人西比該所擊殺的一位非利士巨人的兒子 (代上20:4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细派 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "筛选"
被户沙人西比该所击杀的一位非利士巨人的儿子 (代上20:4)
